channel.title: Satellite (MODIS) Thermal Hotspots and Fire Activity - ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World, Esri
channel.description: Thermal activity detected by the MODIS sensors on the NASA Aqua and Terra satellites during the last 48 hours.
